name: DeleteLoyaltyReward
description:
Delete a loyalty reward and restore loyalty points.

Use this tool to delete a loyalty reward, which restores loyalty points to the account. It also updates the associated order by removing the reward and related discounts if an order ID was specified. The reward cannot be deleted if it has been redeemed.

parameters.name: reward_id
parameters.description: The ID of the loyalty reward to delete. This is required to identify which reward to remove and restore points for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [loyalty reward](entity:LoyaltyReward) to delete.
